website_summaries.verdict: Hunters and campers will appreciate the Wicked Hand Saw's aggressive saw blade and its secure locking pin technology. If safe portability is a priority, this is the model to consider.
pros: Great for performing "field cuts" during camping and hunting trips
Locking pin is hardened steel, not plastic
Folds safely in rubberized handle between uses
cons: Rubber grip can become loose over time
Other folding saws available at lower price point

customer_reviews.title: Great saw. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great saw. Very sturdy. Locks open and closed for safety. I think the only issue I have about this is that it's almost too sturdy for the size of hand to blade ratio. I think a slightly longer saw blade with matching handle length would be more worth the bulkiness and weight of the saw for the additional cutting power it provides.
customer_reviews.author: Kevster

customer_reviews.title: Made in China, By an American company...
customer_reviews.text: Saw seems solid. Have not used it yet. Only 4 stars because package says made in China. Feel like I was lead to believe this was an American made product. Made buy an American hunter for an American hunter. Not true... Glad I didn’t pay 40 from Cabela’s. Update 4/1/19. This saw is a major let down. Don’t let the hunting public sell u on this. Saw I received does not do what the saw on utube does when the hunting public is promoting it...
customer_reviews.author: OTTO

customer_reviews.title: Awesome saw, I use this thing to trim/prune trees
customer_reviews.text: Awesome saw, I use this thing to trim/prune trees, branches and brush not only around the house, but in the field while hunting as well. Great for clearing a path for a ground blind or tree stand, strong and durable, both the blade and the handle are very well constructed, like it so much, bought a second one for my son to use. Great for using as a bone saw as well, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley D Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Crazy tough saw
customer_reviews.text: Toughest hand saw out there in my opinion. I have both this saw and the Hooyman and think this is much tougher. The build quality is fantastic and seems like it will be a "forever" type of product. I took down a 10" in diameter tree this past rifle season when setting up my stand. Anything that can do that, yet fit inside my waist pack, is perfect! Buy this, you wont regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Smart Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Robust saw
customer_reviews.text: Cuts great and durable. I like the design with the rubberized grip and lock. It is a bit heavy for packing, but really really good for just day trips or camping. I like it. Haven't cut enough to try to re-sharpen, but they sell replacement blades too. Great deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Cluley

customer_reviews.title: Rusted after two months. By a better one not this.
customer_reviews.text: Safetly lock rusted away in two months. Now I have to use it open. A sure danger. Not constructed to use out side and too much to pay for a dangerous open saw. Buy one better made and skip this one .
customer_reviews.author: marc

customer_reviews.title: The best...
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing to dislike about this saw. IT IS TOUGH! It makes short work of branches. A must have for hunting, camping, landscapers and around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Mike prete

customer_reviews.title: Solidly built hand saw
customer_reviews.text: This is a well built hand saw - the blade is sharp and aggressive, and the rubberized grip is very firm. One slight gripe I have is that I sometimes have to futz with the blade lock a bit to get it open. Once open, the blade locks solidly into place. It may be a bit pricey, but it's definitely worth it if you have a need of a quality folding saw.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome saw!
customer_reviews.text: This is a hardcore little saw! All my other plastic handled saws break after moderate use but this one has lasted all season and the joints haven't loosened or cracked. Great for keeping in your pack!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Built to Last
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several folding hand saws to use to help clear branches when I am out in the desert in my Jeep. This wicked hand saw is by far the the best hand saw i have ever used. I guess the best review I can give about this is that every buddy I have shown this to has bought one. It really is a great product, well built, cuts fast and looks cool....
customer_reviews.author: Cast4fun

customer_reviews.title: Refer to Kip Campbell
customer_reviews.text: It’s like having a chan saw In your pocket without all the danger of an actual Chain saw
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM M BAGERT

customer_reviews.title: Nice knife but hard to use.
customer_reviews.text: It is much, much harder to use than the video indicates. Of course, at my age (77) I don't have the strength that a younger person has.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: wicked is right
customer_reviews.text: split an elk down the middle like it was butter
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hand saw! Strong, solid, sharp blade. Recommend to everybody.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C.

customer_reviews.title: JimR
customer_reviews.text: Love this saw, have one in yellow also. Would be nice if it came with a case, but made one.
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I did a bunch of research before deciding on which hand saw to purchase. This is the one hands down I used it in the woods cutting shooting lanes for hunting season and the Wicked hand saw did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: RoadWarrior77

customer_reviews.title: Earned a permanent spot in my backpack
customer_reviews.text: Super sharp, durable, and hefty - more light weight than you may expect, but it feels solid in the hand. I bought this for pruning limbs for hunting in my treestand. I will never go hunting without it.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Pinkley

customer_reviews.title: Good Saw!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this saw for my boyfriend as a Christmas present and was truly impressed with the size and quality, he absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: After breaking at least 6 or 7 other brands over the last couple years, I bought the wicked edge. This sucker is sharp and fits nicely in my hunting pack. I won't hit the woods without it!
customer_reviews.author: joz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome saw. have had quiet a few but this is the best. should not need another one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D Steadman

customer_reviews.title: Great saw!
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp and strong for those big limbs that are in your way. Doesn’t take up a whole lot of room In the pack. Would recommend for the avid outdoorsman.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Abercrombie

customer_reviews.title: Light, Sharp and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Very light and easy to use. Fits perfectly in the hand. No problem trimming in and around branches. Took minutes to saw through limbs for this senior lady.
customer_reviews.author: M mom

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for a gift. I was disappointed when it arrived with no zip ties attached, they were all broken. As you can see the saw isn't attached to the package at all. It was boxed well, I don't think it come apart during transit.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for cleaning up smaller branches and clearing shooting lanes.
customer_reviews.author: Nitroman!

customer_reviews.title: Very nice just Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Super sharp but it’s a little heavy for my turkey vest
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Hand trim saw
customer_reviews.text: Strong good quality product. Cuts well, although I would have like a longer blade. Another 2" would would make it much more suitable for cutting larger branches
customer_reviews.author: James Pitre

customer_reviews.title: ... up my tree stand cutting branches way it works good real good wicked hand
customer_reviews.text: I used a soul to put up my tree stand cutting branches way it works good real good wicked hand saw
customer_reviews.author: Busboy2

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: Just used the saw yesterday as I was using my climbing stand. It seemed vey sturdy compared to the others I have used and broken in the past. It cut quickly and it was well worth the money because unless I lose it, this saw could be the last one I buy.
customer_reviews.author: D Fennell

customer_reviews.title: A++++
customer_reviews.text: When you have to have the absolute toughest saw for your kit or bag..... THIS IS IT!!! I've tried the other brands and they all come up lacking when compared to this saw!
customer_reviews.author: KayakingKampingKevinTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I picked up this saw for bow season and it performed flawlessly. It is both easy to use and cuts very well. It is a must have for anyone with a climbing stand.
customer_reviews.author: mattihs27

customer_reviews.title: Best hand saw on the market
customer_reviews.text: Yep. Best hand saw on the market. A must-have for the serious bowhunter.
customer_reviews.author: Josh W

customer_reviews.title: Good and sharp
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to open, but works well. Good and sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tool - sharp as can be and super compact. Will cut anything that you put to it.
customer_reviews.author: MrCharlie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tool
customer_reviews.text: Cuts great, solid grip, folded fits in my cargo pocket. Perfect using it with climbing tree stand to prune on the way up. Will be nice for camping too.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeGear

customer_reviews.title: Great saw
customer_reviews.text: Cuts through oak and iron wood with ease. Very sharp. Been using one for years to limb out bow and gun stands.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hardy

customer_reviews.title: A fine addition to my hunting accessories
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly as I expected. A fine addition to my hunting accessories.
customer_reviews.author: lyndon johnson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this saw ! It's a little heavy but tuff as nails !
customer_reviews.author: David Agostini

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Rock solid hand saw. The best and the toughest that I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well for smaller trees and branches. Very well built and folds up easily for storage in a backpack or pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ransdell

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: awesome. heavy duty and well built, I'll never have to buy another cheap plastic saw. Just buy this saw and you will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: It cuts good but the blade is very wobbly so I expect it to wear out and break very soon. If you can find it for $20 or less then you may want to consider it but the average price of this saw is robbery.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Lent

customer_reviews.title: Really Impressive
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item. Best tree saw on the market. Cuts through anything and everything. Really helps with using a climber or needing to clear up a shooting lane from your treestand.
customer_reviews.author: JerseyDeerGuy

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I hoped.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for some yard work, to take on hunting and hiking trips. Also for a B.O.B. Item arrived quickly from seller. Item seems ok but I see it's made in China, the rubber hand grip is already loose. I think it will serve my intended purpose but if I could do it all over I'd purchase the BAHCO
customer_reviews.author: Randy Scardino

customer_reviews.title: Its an ok saw but for the price you expect more
customer_reviews.text: It is kind of heavy and cuts alright. That being said, I didn't notice a big difference in the 9.99 big game saw. I think I over paid on this one... but supposedly they hold up better, so we will see....
customer_reviews.author: Sean Purcell

product_meta.title: Wicked Hand Saw, Black (51025)
product_meta.description: Style:Hand SawThe Wicked Tough Hand saw features a ruged cast aluminum handle and hardened steel lock mechanism.
feature_bullets: Impulse hardened high carbon steel blade
Comfortable non-slip rubber over-mold grip design - ergonomically designed to fit your hand
Fail safe blade lock design - hardened steel lock-pin & hardware, no plastic to break
Closed length: 8.25 in. - blade length: 7.0 in

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars81 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
